journeys.description: Report your passport as lost or stolen and cancel it to protect your identity

journeys.name: Apply for Universal Credit
journeys.description: Universal Credit is a payment to help with your living costs

journeys.name: Apply for State Pension
journeys.description: Claim your State Pension online if you're eligible

journeys.name: Register with a GP
journeys.description: Register with a doctor's surgery to access NHS services

journeys.name: Book a COVID-19 vaccination
journeys.description: Book or manage your coronavirus vaccination appointments

journeys.name: Apply to join the Armed Forces
journeys.description: Apply to become a soldier, sailor or airman

journeys.name: Apply for a medal
journeys.description: Apply for or replace military medals and awards

journeys.name: Apply for student finance
journeys.description: Apply for student loans and grants for university or college

journeys.name: Find a school
journeys.description: Search for and compare schools in England

journeys.name: Apply for a UK visa
journeys.description: Apply online for a visa to visit, work, study or settle in the UK

journeys.name: Apply to the EU Settlement Scheme
journeys.description: Apply for settled or pre-settled status under the EU Settlement Scheme

journeys.name: Apply for probate
journeys.description: Apply for the legal right to deal with someone's property, money and possessions when they die

journeys.name: Make a claim to an employment tribunal
journeys.description: Resolve a dispute with your employer

journeys.name: Apply for a driving licence
journeys.description: Apply for your first provisional driving licence or renew your existing licence

journeys.name: Get a vehicle log book (V5C)
journeys.description: Get a new or replacement vehicle log book

journeys.name: Make a money claim
journeys.description: Claim money you're owed by a person or business

journeys.name: Apply for divorce
